introduction: The artists clipped the note written with network chat group number on the luminous flying toys and lunched them to the different employee dormitories of Changan Town, Dongguan City in the night, so that ensured the people in the group chat with each other. They attempted to establish a group of network times in the most ancient and primitive ways of information transmission艺术家把写有网络聊天群号的纸条夹在发光的飞行玩具上，在夜晚弹射到东莞长安镇上的不同的工厂职工宿舍里。使所有加群的人进入一个网络聊天群开始聊天。试图用最古老而原始的信息传递方式去建立一个网络时代的群。
